summary: The video showcases a new effect for Palestine, encouraging viewers to post one video per day using this filter. It emphasizes that posting once each weekday (Monday through Friday) will count towards a total, allowing users to accumulate posts over time. The message is clear and straightforward, aiming to engage the audience in consistent content creation.
keywords: Palestine, new effect, video filter, daily posts, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, private, public, count, quotes
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
